title: IS_ALL_LOWER_CASE
description: Returns TRUE if the string contains only lowercase alphabetical characters; otherwise, returns FALSE.
examples:
IS_ALL_LOWER_CASE("Device #01")
-- Returns FALSE, only lowercase letters a–z are accepted.

tips.text: Returns FALSE if the string is empty.
Only lowercase letters (a–z) are accepted; any uppercase letters, numbers, spaces, or symbols will result in FALSE.
